name: New York Dog Pretzel Bites
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: All the classic flavors of a New York dog served bite sized on Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®.
ingredients: 2 frankfurter (5 in long x 3/4 in dia, 10 per pound)s all-beef hot dogs
16 each Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
1 tablespoon spicy brown mustard, or to taste
directions: Bring a small saucepan of water to a boil over high
Add hot dogs; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 5 minutes
Melt butter in a small skillet over medium heat
Add onions and saute until onions are soft and have started to brown, about 5 minutes
Arrange Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps® on a serving platter
Top with about a teaspoon sauerkraut and a hot dog round
Drizzle with mustard and top with grilled onions
